comments: Provision of professional architectural and cost planning services for roof replacement at building G10 at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre in St. John's, Newfoundland.  For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department. This contract was sole-sourced. This contract is a multi-year contract.
